node.doctext: [Snippets Section|Snippets] was an old section intended for the posting of very small bits of code — e.g., one-liners. It was redundant with [Cool Uses For Perl], and so was put out to pasture (i.e. disabled). All new code postings (other than obfu and poetry) should be done in [CUFP].
node.title: About the Snippets Section
